Key Match Events: Luka Doncic put up a solid first-quarter performance with 14 points, five rebounds, and three assists.
Dallas Mavericks ended the first half with a huge 65-40 lead.
Luka Doncic added 11 more points and shot an accurate 60% from the field in the first half.
Dallas Mavericks increased their lead to a 27-point deficit by the third quarter.
Dallas Mavericks came out on top with a 108-85 victory.
Luka Doncic nearly finished the game with a triple-double, putting up 32 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists, matched with 50% shooting from the field overall.
Daniel Gafford contributed with 18 points and eight rebounds, shooting 69.2% from the field.
Dereck Lively II scored 11 points and grabbed 11 rebounds.
